channel.title: Regedit on Timetombs
channel.description: Recent content in Regedit on Timetombs

item.title: [Windows] regedit
item.description:
1 regedit.exe

注册表是Windows中的一个非常重要的数据库，用于存储系统和应用程序的设置信息。regedit.exe(Registry Editor)是Windows的注册表编辑器。

位于 : %systemroot%\regedit.exe

2 *.reg文件格式

  1. 文件扩展名 : .reg。
  2. 编码方式 : UTF-16 LE。
  3. 换行 : CRLF。
  4. 注释 : ;。
  5. 删除 : -。

3 列表

reg文件列表
HDTunePro6.00.reg 
��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\EFD Software]



[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\EFD Software\HDTunePro]

"Name"="Administrator"

"Company"="EFD Software"

"Test Parameters 3"="29 23 6C 64 95 B6 F2 89 F1 50 E8 D6 00 00 00 00"

"Show Status"=dword:00000001

"Allow Power Change"=dword:00000001

"Scan A B Drives"=dword:00000000

"Show Drive Serial"=dword:00000000

"Show Drive Letters"=dword:00000001

"Temperature Units"=dword:00000000

"Critical Temperature"=dword:00000037

"Device Critical Temperature"=dword:00000001

"HE Log Path"="D:\\_app\\_hdtune\\_log"

"HE Log Path"="C:\\Users\\lnh\\AppData\\Roaming\\HD Tune Pro"

"Open File Dialog"=dword:00000000

"Replace Spaces"=dword:00000001

"Auto Save"=dword:00000001

"Save Path"="D:\\_app\\_hdtune\\_test"

"Save Filter"="%N-%S-%F-%I-%D-%T"

"Date Format"="yyyyMMdd"

"Time Format"="HHmmss"
class-context-menu.hide.reg 
��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



;Class Conext Menu

��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



;Class Conext Menu

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32]

@=""
context-menu.empty-recycle-bin.reg 
��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Directory\Background\shell\EmptyRecycleBin]

"CommandStateHandler"="{c9298eef-69dd-4cdd-b153-bdbc38486781}"

"Description"="@shell32.dll,-31332"

"Icon"="shell32.dll,-254"

"MUIVerb"="@shell32.dll,-10564"



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Directory\Background\shell\EmptyRecycleBin\command]

"DelegateExecute"="{48527bb3-e8de-450b-8910-8c4099cb8624}"
context-menu.txt.reg 
��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.txt]

@="txtfile"

"PerceivedType"="text"

"Content Type"="text/plain"



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.txt\OpenWithProgids]

"VSCode.txt"=""



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.txt\PersistentHandler]

@="{5e941d80-bf96-11cd-b579-08002b30bfeb}"



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.txt\ShellNew]

"ItemName"=hex(2):40,00,25,00,53,00,79,00,73,00,74,00,65,00,6d,00,52,00,6f,00,\

  6f,00,74,00,25,00,5c,00,73,00,79,00,73,00,74,00,65,00,6d,00,33,00,32,00,5c,\

  00,6e,00,6f,00,74,00,65,00,70,00,61,00,64,00,2e,00,65,00,78,00,65,00,2c,00,\

  2d,00,34,00,37,00,30,00,00,00

"NullFile"=""
desktop.shortcut.hide.reg 
��Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\lnkfile]

"IsShortcut"=-



[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\piffile]

"IsShortcut"=-
